head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KATZENSTEIN, ZEITLER, LOIS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KATZENSTEIN, ZEITLER, LOIS

block.p: KATZENSTEIN - ZEITLER-Lois, on January 26th 2007. Beloved widow of Richard Katzenstein and recent wife of Seymour Zeitler, devoted mother of Lin and David/ mother-in-law of Donna. Loving grandmother of Beth and Emily. Funeral Services on Sunday January 28th at 12 noon at Westchester Riverside, 21 West Broad St. Mt Vernon, NY.

KATZENSTEIN - ZEITLER-Lois, on January 26th 2007. Beloved widow of Richard Katzenstein and recent wife of Seymour Zeitler, devoted mother of Lin and David/ mother-in-law of Donna. Loving grandmother of Beth and Emily. Funeral Services on Sunday January 28th at 12 noon at Westchester Riverside, 21 West Broad St. Mt Vernon, NY.
